item.title: Marisa add a quote by Arundhati Roy
item.description: "Another world is not only possible, she is on her way. On a quiet day, I can hear her breathing." -- Arundhati Roy

item.title: Marisa add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Marisa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I say, if your knees arenâ€™t green by the end of the day, you ought to seriously re-examine your life." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Marisa add a quote by Patricia Schroeder
item.description: "I have a brain and a uterus, and I use both. " -- Patricia Schroeder

item.title: Marisa add a quote by Gregory Maguire
item.description: "People who claim that they're evil are usually no worse than the rest of us... It's people who claim that they're good, or any way better than the rest of us, that you have to be wary of." -- Gregory Maguire

item.title: Marisa add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "To see a World in a Grain of Sand And a Heaven in a Wild Flower, Hold Infinity in the palm of your hand And Eternity in an hour." -- William Blake

item.title: Marisa add a quote by Robert Louis Stevenson
item.description: "The best things in life are nearest: Breath in your nostrils, light in your eyes, flowers at your feet, duties at your hand, the path of right just before you. Then do not grasp at the stars, but do life's plain, common work as it comes, certain that daily duties and daily bread are the sweetest things in life." -- Robert Louis Stevenson

item.title: Marisa add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Marisa add a quote by W.B. Yeats
item.description: "The world is full of magic things, patiently waiting for our senses to grow sharper." -- W.B. Yeats
